author: cjodea
msg: add ResourceManager to load resources.

ResourceManager delegates to ResourceResolvers which can be configured on the Bus or added programmatically.  The ResourceManager can be accessed as a service of the bus or as a singleton that is used before the Bus or configuration sub-system are initialized.
Update Bus to initialize a ResourceManager.
Replaced calls to getSystemResourceAsStream with calls to ResourceManager.getResourceAsAsStream
Update ResourceInjector to use ResourceManager to resolve resources.

author: dkulp
msg: Async updates, http updates, cleanup
